bike.description: Specialized FACT 8r carbon, Az1 construction, Designs for Women compact design, Zertz Inserts

components.description: Specialized FACT carbon, monocoque construction, full carbon legs, crown and steerer w/ Zertz inserts
Specialized Mindset Plus, 1-1/8" integrated threadless, sealed stainless steel cartridge bearings, 20mm carbon cone w/ one 10mm and two 5mm carbon spacers
Specialized Pro SL, FACT carbon w/ Zertz insert, 27.2mm
Carbon chain stay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
